content: does anyone have a "how to draw commutative diagrams in zulip's markup" handy? thanks in advance.
You can't, unfortunately. If you want to share a commutative diagram, you'll need to draw it elsewhere and paste it as an image here.

I would recommend permalinks to diagrams made here https://tikzcd.yichuanshen.de/
Which lets you draw Commutative Diagrams

This thread is 4 years old but in case anybody in th future is ever looking and runs across this:
I recommend quiver https://q.uiver.app/ UI is very ergonomic.
